subject: Playoff Games
Concussions
Football
lead_paragraph: In an N.F.L. season defined by offense, the physical, intimidating defense of the San Francisco 49ers has boosted them into the playoffs for the first time since 2002.
snippet: In an N.F.L. season defined by offense, the physical, intimidating defense of the San Francisco 49ers has boosted them into the playoffs for the first time since 2002.
